messages.title: Insanity
messages.content: Doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results - Albert Einstein. UKIP NHS POLICY Free at the point of delivery.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £4 billion increased spending. Veterans are put on local social housing list, prioritised as top of the list.
Endemy degree based SAAS to only STEM, Medical studies, Nursing & AHP and essential public services.
Points based system Computer says NO! Unless on shortage occupation list.
Removing the UK from European Arrest Warrant which is being abused.
Increased £3 billion yearly into NHS England for service delivery only.
Reversing £300 million cut to Scottish councils.
Scrap HS2 & use £50 billion to fund coastal & Northern rail for freight to ease road congestion.
125,000 more police officers on beats. Prison ships for short-term offenders.
End political correctness to enhance free speech.

issues.health: Increased £3 billion yearly into NHS England for service delivery only.
issues.immigration: Points based system Computer says NO! Unless on shortage occupation list.

housing.content: Veterans are put on local social housing list, prioritised as top of the list.
